control.control:
360
heading Weekend.DateCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Date)]
heading Weekend.DayCommon [B]$LOCALIZE[16][/B]
- oforecast icon Weekend.DayIconCommon special://skin/images/weather/$INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.FanartCode)] 100 false 0 BFFFFFFF keep
- outlook label Weekend.DayOutlookCommon Window.Property(Weekend.2.Outlook)
- high temp label [B]$LOCALIZE[393][/B] Weekend.HighTemperatureHeadingCommon
- temp label $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.HighTemperature)] Weekend.HighTemperatureCommon Conditional
- Temp label units Weekend.HighTempUnitsCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.HighTemperature)) Conditional Conditional
Weekend.LowTempHeadingCommon - low temp Window.Property(Weekend.2.LowTemperature) Weekend.LowTempCommon Conditional
- temp units Weekend.LowTempUnitsCommon !StringCompare(Window.Property(Weekend.2.LowTemperature),N/A) Conditional Conditional Conditional
- [B]$LOCALIZE[33029][/B] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed))
- precip $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.ObservedPrecipitation),$LOCALIZE[33021] ,] 130 Weekend.DayOutlookCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed))
- [B]$LOCALIZE[31943][/B] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed))
- observed 525 font13 [I][B]($LOCALIZE[33025])[/B][/I] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed))
- - details labels !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) Weekend.DetailsLabels
- details values 0 vertical 150 Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) - Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Humidity),,%]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.UV)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Wind)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Precipitation),,%]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Sunrise)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Sunset)]
- - observed labels !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) Weekend.ObservedLabels
- observed 170 0 vertical Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) - Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.ObservedAvgHighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.ObservedAvgLowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsLabelsCommon -
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.HighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits] ($INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.DepartureHigh)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits])
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.LowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits] ($INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.DepartureLow)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits])
- Weekend.DetailsLabelsCommon -
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.ObservedRecordHighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.ObservedRecordLowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- - !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) - forecast label Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
- forecast Weekend.ForecastCommon Window.Property(Weekend.2.Forecast) !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.IsFetched))
- - Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.2.Observed)) - forecast label 253 Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
- forecast 274 236 Weekend.ForecastCommon Window.Property(Weekend.2.Forecast) !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.IsFetched))
- precip 525 font13 grey $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.2.Precipitation),$LOCALIZE[33021] ,%] Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
Weekend.DaySeparator

360
heading Weekend.DateCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Date)]
heading Weekend.DayCommon [B]$LOCALIZE[17][/B]
- oforecast icon Weekend.DayIconCommon special://skin/images/weather/$INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.FanartCode)] 100 false 0 BFFFFFFF keep
- outlook label Weekend.DayOutlookCommon Window.Property(Weekend.3.Outlook)
- high temp label [B]$LOCALIZE[393][/B] Weekend.HighTemperatureHeadingCommon
- temp label $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.HighTemperature)] Weekend.HighTemperatureCommon Conditional
- Temp label units Weekend.HighTempUnitsCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.HighTemperature)) Conditional Conditional
Weekend.LowTempHeadingCommon - low temp Window.Property(Weekend.3.LowTemperature) Weekend.LowTempCommon Conditional
- temp units Weekend.LowTempUnitsCommon !StringCompare(Window.Property(Weekend.3.LowTemperature),N/A) Conditional Conditional Conditional
- [B]$LOCALIZE[33029][/B] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed))
- precip $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.ObservedPrecipitation),$LOCALIZE[33021] ,] 130 Weekend.DayOutlookCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed))
- [B]$LOCALIZE[31943][/B] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed))
- observed 525 font13 [I][B]($LOCALIZE[33025])[/B][/I] Weekend.DetailsHeadingCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed))
- - details labels !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) Weekend.DetailsLabels
- details values 0 vertical 150 Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) - Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Humidity),,%]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.UV)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Wind)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Precipitation),,%]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Sunrise)]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Sunset)]
- - observed labels !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) Weekend.ObservedLabels
- observed 170 0 vertical Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) - Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.ObservedAvgHighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.ObservedAvgLowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsLabelsCommon -
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.HighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits] ($INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.DepartureHigh)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits])
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.LowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits] ($INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.DepartureLow)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits])
- Weekend.DetailsLabelsCommon -
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.ObservedRecordHighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- Weekend.DetailsValuesCommon $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.ObservedRecordLowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits]
- - !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) - forecast label Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
- forecast Weekend.ForecastCommon Window.Property(Weekend.3.Forecast) !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.IsFetched))
- - Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeekendDetails) + IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.3.Observed)) - forecast label 253 Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
- forecast 274 236 Weekend.ForecastCommon Window.Property(Weekend.3.Forecast) !IsEmpty(Window.Property(Weekend.IsFetched))
- precip 525 font13 grey $INFO[Window.Property(Weekend.3.Precipitation),$LOCALIZE[33021] ,%] Weekend.ForecastHeadingCommon
